nodes.text: Easy Xiukhan was a female Zabrak who joined the crew run by a smuggler, assisting in all sorts of missions. The smuggler was part of the Uprising, fighting against the Galactic Empire in the Anoat sector at the time of the Iron Blockade. Xiukhan was a stealthy, mastermind criminal, leading other law-breakers in large credit heists against the Bank of Aargau, The Falleen Emerald and The Lady Fate Casino.
